name: Cyndicate - Mafia Tycoon (Mobile friendly)
description:
This game is obviously not finished, but if you have suggestions, leave them below :)

Pitch:

A mafia management game inwhich the goal is to make ungodly sums of money from organized crime. Your illigal activities will make money for you, whilst you plot your next scheme,  but be weary, the police are on your tail, and they are closing in. When they get too close, you must pause your illigal activities to avoid being busted, and resume them whenever the police has backed off. But while you wait for the police to heat to die down, the police will be compiling evidence of past activites, potentially leading to a bust. this is all up to you to manage! Get rich or die trying.

GameJam

This game is made specifically for the Mini Jam 60, with the theme of crime, and the restriction that all games must focus on pausing. The game was made in one day, and still needs a bit of balancing. Sound and animation has been added, as well as an introduction to the main mechanichs  at the start of each game. Please enjoy :)
